ygData.subject: O/T I'll probably get flamed for this by some, but..
ygData.msgSnippet: Everquest will have a strong competition and also you must think that a Asherons call will go gold 1 year after wverquest and that they will try to exploit all
ygData.messageBody:
Everquest will have a strong competition and also you must think that a
Asherons call will go gold 1 year after wverquest and that they will try to
exploit all mistakes wich everquest team done.

Also asheron call have interesting idea of heritage sistem with passing exp
to higer lv and spell sistem can be interesting.

Everquest will try to take this advantages down with future remake of trade
skills and with new better graphic in new addon.

But everquest is long from its maturity as we have seen online games start
to be god only after some time after relase 6 months to 1 year is my opinion.

Also Ultima online will get new remake in a new 3D look as ultima 9 if i
understand god some lord british intervieus

Silverion
High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
Fenin Ro
